Name: Ghost Pursuit VR
About the game: Your goal: Escape to the ghosts and collect bonuses to destroy them! Choose your game mode: God Mode or First-Person View VR In-Game Level Editor: Make your customs levels, put blocs, bonuses, ghosts, textures, musics ... fly in your creations in VR. More than 15 official maps Destructible environment A.I.: Ghosts can analyze changes to their environment and even break walls 3 attack bonuses: Proximity bomb, Fireball and Wall breaker 3 defense bonuses: Invulnerability, Ultra Speed and Invisibility
Meta Title: Ghost Pursuit VR: Sep 1, 2017, Raf1Dev and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ghost Pursuit VR? Check out the release date (Sep 1, 2017), developer insights from Raf1Dev, and a complete game summary.
